description:
Amber Rayne and Cherry Torn endured a 6+ hour long, tough live show. It's posted here if you didn't catch it the first time, or even if you did and want to see it again in the edited version along with the accompanying high resolution photographic documentation.
Part 1 of 2.
Note: This bonus update is being posted as a courtesy as today's regularly scheduled update will not be ready until early evening due to editing and encoding problems. The regular update will be posted later in the day once the editing team is able to fix the problem and complete it.
title: Amber Rayne Live Show, Part 1
